usp_section.title: Benefits of Shopping for
usp_section.description: Enjoy various exclusive benefits that you won't find elsewhere. We are committed to providing more value for every transaction.

benefits.title: Free Shipping for Surrounding Areas
benefits.description: Free delivery for areas around THEI. Save costs, get it fast!

benefits.title: 5-10% Opening Discount
benefits.description: Get a special grand opening discount every day for all spare part products.

benefits.title: 1-Month Warranty
benefits.description: Official warranty for all spare parts. Terms and conditions apply.

benefits.title: Free Oil Filter
benefits.description: Buy 1 gallon of oil (4 liters) and get 1 free original oil filter.

benefits.title: Free Member Card
benefits.description: Collect points with every transaction, exchange them for discounts or attractive prizes.

benefits.title: Partnership Program
benefits.description: Attractive commissions for workshop partners. Join us and profit together!

benefits.title: Cashback up to 3%
benefits.description: Cashback for large volume purchases. The more you buy, the bigger the cashback.

benefits.title: Free Mechanic Training
benefits.description: Free training with certified instructors to improve your team's skills.

benefits.title: Free Workshop Uniform
benefits.description: Get an exclusive co-branded THEI uniform for your workshop team.

benefits.title: Partner Promotion Support
benefits.description: Banners, and other promotional support for workshop partners.

hero.subtitle: GENUINE SPARE PARTS FOR YOUR HEAVY EQUIPMENT
hero.title: Guaranteed Availability, Maximum Performance

features_section.title: Why Choose Our Genuine Spare Parts?

features.name: Easy Ordering
features.description: Order via WhatsApp, Hotline, or request form.

features.name: Spare Part Delivery Service
features.description: Enjoy the convenience of having spare parts delivered directly to your location.

features.name: Guaranteed Spare Parts
features.description: Official warranty for every spare part you buy at THEI.

features.name: Service Without Holidays
features.description: Our team is ready to serve your spare part needs every day, including weekends and holidays.

category_section.title: Explore Spare Part Categories
category_section.description: Find the specific spare parts you need from our complete catalog.

promo_section.title: This Month's Special Promo
promo_section.description: See a simulation of how to easily order spare parts via WhatsApp and get attractive offers.

fast_movers_section.title: Fast Moving Spare Parts
fast_movers_section.description: The table below shows the most frequently sought-after spare parts by our customers. All are guaranteed 100% genuine.

location.title: Location of
location.description: Find the location of THEI's official spare parts store and warehouse for your heavy equipment needs.
